website_summaries.verdict: This is an effective, lightweight and affordable shaver that makes it easy to sculpt a beard of multiple lengths. We worry a little about the battery performance, but as long as you're able to leave it on charge overnight every few sessions you should be okay.
cons: Battery life doesn't live up to maker's claims

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget the cut length dial
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, not quite as polished as I was expecting, but that's probably just me being over picky, this was cheap after all. Just don't forget the blade length setting, my first encounter; popped the guard on, set the blade length to 8mm to trim my beard, worked great, took the guard off and set the length to the lowest to trim the top of my lip, worked great, popped the guard back on and thought, eyebrows are a bit bushy, lets do those too.... forgot to set the length again so now look like I have hardly any eyebrows, I'm used to changing guards to set the length.... duh!
customer_reviews.author: Umbra

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a standard 2 pin UK shaver socket.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't see that this came with an EU 2 pin plug rather than a UK standard 2 pin shaver plug. Having bought this as a present was very disappointed to get the feedback from the recipient and feel that I now need to buy the required converter rather than go round the houses to have it returned and find an alternative. Any reputable company selling into the UK market should use UK standards and not require additional converters.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hair and beard machine 10/10.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic razor and don’t be put off by the beard reviews , I don’t have a beard and was a bit wary of buying this item for hair cutting but how wrong I was. It’s a fantastic razor for hair cutting and trimming and is sharp and easy to use. I think Braun should advertise this item a bit more on the hair cutting side as well as a beard cutter as it seems to be very good on both. A great buy and I would definitely recommend it to anyone for beard and hair cutting 10/10 from me.
customer_reviews.author: J Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Mis-Sold on product picture (No foil shaver)
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok however a big issue for me hence the low rating is the false advertising by displaying a picture bottom right accessory as a foil shaver attachment which is why I chose this product only to find it’s not there! When tried to contact Braun through customer services and online chat go no response or acknowledgement thus bad customer experience and feel mis-sold an item! Suggest the picture is updated or removed to avoid any other customer confusion!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for giving yourself a DIY haircut
customer_reviews.text: Gave myself a full haircut with this during this coronavirus lockdown and it's probably one of my best haircut I've had, goodbye barbers!!! The device cuts hair really well and it's fairly lightweight so it's easy to use. Highly recommend this, worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nazrul

customer_reviews.title: 36 years of hassle gone
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for a couple of weeks, but i’ve Had a beard for 36 years. In that time i’ve Had a number of trimmers. This one so far gives the best trim i’ve ever had and it’s so easy to use. Although my wife would like it not to leave trimmings on the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Foreign power socket, cannot use in UK without adaptor.
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed in both Braun and Amazon here. Nowhere in the listing does it mention that the product is a European one with the two round prong European plug, meaning you cannot charge this in the UK without an adaptor. Obviously Braun should make this clear in the listing, however Amazon I also place part of this blame on Amazon - I have a UK account with UK shipping and delivery, Amazon should not serve me product listings for foreign objects that are incompatible. Outside of that it's a fine product hence the two stars not one, however points lost here for it being frankly misleading as a listing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Comes with an EU charger
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that it comes with an EU charger so needed to buy an adaptor. It isn't the standard 2pin UK shaver socket type, the prongs are thinner. One reviewer uploaded a picture of it falling out of the wall socket, but it's not the weight of the charger as suggested, it's just the wrong type. Other than that it actually performs OK.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good value
customer_reviews.text: It'll take a little time to get used to how light this is compared the the mains powered Wahl dog clipper type trimmer I used for years. So much easier without the mains lead. Didn't take long to master the length setting, Started long and worked down until I was happy. Easy to adjust and to clean. Happy with this purchase. One thing, it comes with a 2 pin shaver plug so you'll need an adapter socket if you charge from a 3 pin mains socket - £2.50 in ASDA. Update. I've used it daily for a couple of weeks now and it's great. Easy to use and to clean. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Scot

customer_reviews.title: Already paid for itself
customer_reviews.text: As no barbers open and my son and I both have a buzz cut, he’s 3, I thought I’d try this. Feels good quality, time will tell on durability and battery life. Really easy to adjust the length with the twist dial and cuts hair great. It’s already paid for itself with 2 home cuts vice the barber so I can’t complain!
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting better from Braun
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality but didn't really work well for me. The trimmer kept pulling my hair. I ended up returning it and bought a trimmer from a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: asterix77

customer_reviews.title: this is an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: No barbershops, so I thought I would have go at cutting my own hair. I am pretty happy with my first attempt. I normally have a No 8 , which is short back and sides, not too short. That seems to correspond to about a 20 mm setting on this clipper. Thats about the maximum setting you can find As for technique, I just did what the barber normally does, standing in front of a very large mirror. So far so good. Haven't tried the beard trimming yet, but that should be all good
customer_reviews.author: Mark S

customer_reviews.title: Good, but don't drop it.... Funny story below....
customer_reviews.text: So, even though it survived the drop no problem, somehow in the process of it slipping through my hands, it hitting the floor or picking it back up, it changed my setting and I didn't notice until I saw a very short streak. I then had to even it out. Brilliant device though for my head-hair and facial hair. Not so good for downstairs though - never made my twig bleed before until I tried this down there.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Beard trimmer. The title is very misleading.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beard trimmer. The hair clipping function seems to be for tidying up the edges. As hair clippers are scarce during lockdown they are boosting sales by advertising it as as a hair clippers but as the title on the box shows, it is not. As I can't go out to return this product I am now stuck with it but its longest length is way too short for cutting hair in this house as we don't hang out at far-right rallies or rock the skinhead look for fashion reasons.
customer_reviews.author: snowzz

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life - even if it is Li Ion.  Enough for Three trims only
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this trimmer for 6 months now and I've only ever been able to get three trims out of each Li Ion battery charge. Its very uncharacteristic of Braun to herald inclusion of a new battery technology but then fit the device with a one of very small capacity. I'd send this back if I could.
customer_reviews.author: AbyssalPlain

customer_reviews.title: Very good but with a couple of minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: Good points: Cuts well Easy to use Lots of length settings Brilliant battery life Easy to clean Not so good points: The attachments look as if they will break easy. The plug is not a standard UK 3 pin so you need an adaptor. Easy to accidentally change length setting during operation.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Edgley

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: bought to replace the beard trimmer I bought my Dad about 30 years ago. 2 fittings cover the 20 different settings and dead easy to use and snap on and off. Then you just turn the dial to the required length. Came semi-charged. Dad seemed impressed and this will help tidy his beard up a bit. You get quality with Braun so I await his feedback.
customer_reviews.author: andywalter

customer_reviews.title: Easy Hair Cuts!
customer_reviews.text: Bought to cut my hair during Covid 19. I'm a "number 2 all over", these clippers are spot on for that type of cut. My 9 year old son cut my hair for me, easily and I still have both ears! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product 10/10!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This product came to me fully charged and is SUPER easy to use. We are in lockdown at the moment and can't go to the barbers. The instructions are clear and I used it without a guard too, to shape the hair more precisely in some parts like around the ears. It causes no irritation and is relatively quiet too! If I could give it 10 stars I would! I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: It’s a shame it’s not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: What a great product, initially bought these as hair clippers were out of stock everywhere. They managed to trim my hair with ease (I had thick long hair). These also are great beard trimmers and have since replaced my one blade. It’s just a shame it’s not waterproof, for that it loses 1 star. I have since bought the bigger version designed actually for hair, and I can’t fault them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Grading comb connection to the adjuster is too fragile and stopped working after about 3 trims. Very disappointed because I’ve always seen Braun as a quality brand. This product isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Geof

customer_reviews.title: WORST TRIMMER EVER USED!!
customer_reviews.text: Stay clear of this rubbish it's terrible battery runs out before finishing shaving doesn't trim beard accurately makes a mess of your hair and beard please don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Good for 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve gone through a couple of beard trimmers and with the expensive ones I generally don’t feel you get value for money. This one is by far the best I have used whilst being one of the cheapest. I would definitely recommend but please note that this comes with a European 2 pin plug so you will require and adapter for use in UK. I don’t believe this is made clear enough in the advert. Update 14/10/2020 - Battery life is terrible and has been getting gradually worse. Literally halfway through a beard trim the battery will completely deplete from a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Petersen

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my haircuts during the Coronavirus lock-down and am already mightily impressed. Easy to hold, easy to use and will have covered its cost in less than three months. I don't wear a beard anymore so readers of this review who do will have to research a bit more. A cutter/trimmer is never going to replace the good people who regularly cut my hair - Louise in Abingdon, Oxfordshire and Roger in Lincoln - and the wonderful conversations I have with them. So one day I'll be going back to them. Meanwhile this cutter will be a useful friend for now, and one day when my travels they start again; as well as for the occasional touch-up.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Rzoska

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great beard trimmer. I purchased this purely for beard trimming and it is excellent because its easy to hold and trims in very small increments allowing you to get exactly the right length to suit you. I read other reviews that were negative and I was almost put off. If you want a beard trimmer this is very good value for money. I can't comment on battery life because I haven't had it long enough. The plug is designed to be inserted into a shaver socket in the bathroom so you may need an adaptor if you don't have a shaver socket.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap. Under performs
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a beard trimmer and it takes at least 10 passes to trim one area. For the price I would have expected this to be able to cut with 1 or 2 passes. Takes me alot longer to do now. Feels cheap. Feels like it should have cost £15 not 69
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Worst beard timmer I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nothing short of woeful! Taken about 25 minutes to get stubble down to 1.5mm from about 3mm and still uneven. Trying to trim the neck line is almost impossible and leaves me with inflamed irritated skin. Worst trimmer I have ever used. Previous Remington and Phillip's trimmers do a far better job than this costing less too. Thought I'd give braun a try but huge mistake. My nose hair trimmer has more grunt than this! Going to seek refund if this is possible after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Jinx

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Never had a Braun product prior to buying this and thought I would give it try. What a waste of money. Blades are too harsh and battery doesn't last very long, I have gone back to using my old shaver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Fuss Beard Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I like this trimmer. Its design is refreshingly simple, with no fiddly features. There’s the adjustable comb, the cutter assembly, both of which can simply be lifted off for cleaning, and the power unit; that’s it. It’s comfortable to use, both on my beard and, indeed, on my hair. Adjusted to its highest setting (10), it trims my hair perfectly well. The battery provides enough power to drive the cutting mechanism with precision. Obviously, it has less oomph than a mains-powered device but this doesn’t seem to affect its function in any significant way. Simple, very reasonably priced and fit for purpose. What more does one need?
customer_reviews.author: RobinJ

customer_reviews.title: Great flexibility clippers
customer_reviews.text: These clippers are an excellent purchase, very good quality and a comfortable weight to use. The battery life is excellent, but you will need a 2 pin to 3 pin adaptor if you don't have a shaver socket. The 2 guide combs are adjustable for cuts from 1mm to 20mm making it really easy to get the length you want, the inclusion of a separate razor and blades makes this great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: Great little trimmer but beware
customer_reviews.text: Guys, this thing is awesome for your beard although only comes with one grade but thats what you get for choosing the cheap option as you can buy more of them for a more expensive retail price. DISLCAIMER: DO NOT use this to shave your nethers trust me, this thing is razor sharp and its not afraid to let you know it, buy a dedicated trimmer for that which is what i Have done. P.s. its not very powerful either i have cheaper trimmers with more power, struggles to get through course hair with one pass, i often find myself going over the same spot over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need
customer_reviews.text: this was bought to replaced a aging version - i would have waited to buy the version with extra accessories but i needed it asap. takes a long time to charge but hasnt run out of juice when in use and is a sturdier design than my previous item so can't fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Soon paid for itself with "Lockdown haircuts"
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this. After a few uses it had paid for itself. It is easy to use, simple to clean and very efficient. It has not yet needed recharging after eight haircuts so battery life is strong. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ceric7

customer_reviews.title: Cheap & cheerful
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does but just be careful that the attachments are fully locked into place, as I had removed it to clean some hair build up and put it back on it was gave a tighter cut than expected or wanted ...oops lol thankfully the hair will have grown back before anyone will see it! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Aisling

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to be honest. Not only was it annoying to buy this with prime next day Only to receive it two days later, the actual razor isn’t that great. Got it for shaving my beard not head. I’ve had 2 Babyliss razors before this that were much better. Feels like I have to repeatedly go over the same place to get an even trim. It also isn’t the most comfortable, feeling like it’s scraping my skin. It’s nice and light and easy to hold but quite messy with hair going everywhere. Will do for now and glad I only paid £20. Will pay a bit more for the Babyliss again when this eventually packs up!
customer_reviews.author: Benay79

customer_reviews.title: 5 star hair clippers
customer_reviews.text: dont have a beard bought these as hair clippers and they are superb some reviewers dont know what they are talklng about they should read the instruction book. full charge in less than 1 hour you get 2 clipper graded combs 1 for your beard and 1 for your haircut . smaller comb for beard and sideboards and larger one for haircut combs just slide off to change if you remove comb you can use bare blade to trim kneck hair. set mine on number 2 and it cut the same as i have at the barbers. this is a superb piece of klt. i will not be going back to the barbers
customer_reviews.author: dennis l.ucitt

customer_reviews.title: Braun beard trimmer
customer_reviews.text: These are trying times so I bought a trimmer to give myself a haircut. Nice product, easy to use and does the job. Comes with a two pin so you may have to get a three pin adapter. Holds charge really well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and cheerful.
customer_reviews.text: This clipper is good value for the price, but is obviously not a "premium" model. Very plastic feeling, however gets the job done. No accessories apart from a charger (note two pin "shaver socket" charger, not UK 3 pin mains plug) and a cleaning brush. Little disappointing that there is no indication on the shaver as to battery status so, although Braun claim it runs for 4o minutes you have no warning that power is going to go if the battery runs out. However, overall can't really complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Ian King

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Performance
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trimmer as due to this self isolation and the state of my hair I was beginning to look like an ageing throwback to myself in the 70’s!!! Anyway, I put my trust in eldest daughter who has never cut hair before and she has made an amazing job via this little low cost trimmer. Absolutely brilliant performance for the amount paid, various cutting and trimming options. Hair is once again looking fine, not sure I’ll be paying £25.00 every 5 weeks to my hairdresser when things return to normal!!! 🤣🤣
customer_reviews.author: Roboscot

customer_reviews.title: A Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: I can't talf of the shaver too much as it was a birthday gift but from what I saw when it was in use, it was amazing and worth every penny for what you get, especially the extensions. The buttons are very easy to control and simple to use in general. However one down side is that the product I received actually came with an EU plug instead of a UK one so I had to buy an adapter just so it can be used, maybe that's something I could sort out with support but other than that it's an amazing product in my experience. Edit - Amazon resolved the issue so I'm bumping it up to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Bilsbury

customer_reviews.title: For No.1 hair length setting great, otherwise be careful.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: cuts well and battery life is good. Cons: this might be a big con unless your using it at number 1 or with no guard. The adjuster for hair length easily moves as your are putting pressure on it so say you choose 4 and your cutting away and press a little hard click and your suddenly cutting number 3, 2or even 1. It doesn't take a lot to accidentally push the slider in and is no way to lock in position it's just clicks.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Not great but not bad either.
customer_reviews.text: Had a beard a long time. Not so impressed with this product. Seems to struggle to actually cut a beard evenly. But it is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: The40Something

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected....
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the reviews to be here. This is my 4th machine so far, I don’t trim but cut my hair. Painful and hit and miss. I thought I go for a cheap option this time, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Having never grown a beard or moustache in all my 70 plus years I used the lockdown period to go into unchartered territory. Hey presto, after six weeks a new man emerged; a cool dude with the trendiest of facial hair! I then realized I needed a trimmer to keep it like that and the Braun was my choice and I haven't regretted it so far. It took a little time to get used to but then I'd waited a lifetime just to grow my beard. Go ahead, treat yourself.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. S.

customer_reviews.title: Suits my use very well
customer_reviews.text: At first sight I thought this looked too lightweight to be much good. Since then I have cut my fairly shortish ( male ) hair with ease. My wife also trusted me with her longer hair and we are still talking afterwards ! I would think really thick Afro style hair might still be too much for it but it is reasonably priced and worth a try ? It comes with adjustable combs ,is easy to clean and charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: David Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Cuts hair, not just beards as per the box! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Used to cut my hubby's hair during the lockdown. Easy to use and did a good job. Other reviewers tell the manufacturer to change the description from beard trimmer and I totally agree! You really should not be put off by the description on the box, it cuts hair brilliantly, I'm sure you will not be disappointed. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not a hair trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: Cuts well but it's not a hair trimmer, it's just a beard trimmer, unless you like your hair done really really short. I wouldn't buy for cutting hair at all. I am quite disappointed with it tobe honest.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Decent job, but remember to turn the dial when changing combs.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'm the only one to turn to clippers in this time of lockdown. These are very good - my daughter and I sheared our way through my dense thatch fairly well. The only issue I found is that changing the comb sets the cutters to minimum length, and turning the dial all the way down clicks it in to place. Fortunately it was my beard that paid the cost of this discovery, and not my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Hind

customer_reviews.title: Beard and hair trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived day after I ordered - well packed. Horror at opening the parcel - not designed for UK three Pin Plug - comes with two pin! Had to fork out extra money to buy and adapter to take two pin plug to insert into socket. Do not know battery power but put it on charge for four hours. At 10 was not trimming beard - so had to remove clip and use the blade direct to trim. Will try the hair trim tomorrow. This worked well - have to try other settings before I rewrite the review - Easy to hold and clip stays and easy to put. Hence given rating of 3
customer_reviews.author: K. Bharij

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product, but, can only give 4 stars as came with wrong plug for the charger, so had to wait extra few days for the adapter. Apart from that really good, easy to hold and use (change settings and that) and holds plenty of battery :)
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: powerful, waterproof and battery lasts
customer_reviews.text: I grew a bread during lockdown and bought the braun cheapest trimmer, not knowing much about beards. several weeks later I found the starter trimmer not really cutting it, so I bought this one. So much better, cuts faster, battery life seems for ages, its waterproof and has several comb heads to choose. I use it for beards and hair
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hart

customer_reviews.title: Bits of beard in the box
customer_reviews.text: The product has just arrived, sealed and well packaged. After putting it on charge and looking through the box I have found bits of stubble in there which I’m a little unhappy with. Everything else appears clean and was sealed as expected, the box completely undamaged. Looks easy to use, compact and better than switching guards over.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: The trimmer has a short battery life after charging,the electric motor must be low powered and that shows as the revs are noticeably slower in use,it’s a poor product,and very disappointing after years of using a Braun older model that this one has replaced,the only plus is the £19.99 price tag,but I suppose it’s a poor trade off,I definitely would not buy again,I’m losing patience with it,so it will end up in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: Great hair trimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trimmer. After a full charge of 8 hours, I’ve used it for over 60 minutes and going strong. It’s simple to use and the adjustable hair length clipper is great There is only 2 attachments but with the adjustment wheel you can do any length between 0-8 (I think) As you can adjust it so precisely it’s easy to cut your hair on your own (as I do) with a decent mirror. All in all great value and if definitely recommend. Only had 2 months but happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael ryder

customer_reviews.title: Good beard function. Terrible for hair (despite coming with hair combs)
customer_reviews.text: Terrible for cutting hair. Didn't work at all. Had to return it. The hair didn't fall inside the hair combs no matter how it was used. (Have used multiple hair clippers in the past and couldn't understand how a feature so fundamental to it failed so completely. I have a Philips one that was a third of the cost of this one and it works flawlessly in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: CHARGING
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere in the listing does it mention that the product is a European one with the two round prong European plug, meaning you cannot charge this in the UK without an adapter, this should be something that is advertised or clearly displayed. I have re-read through the listing and it does not mention this. Very dissapointed as I now have to buy an adapter
customer_reviews.author: Christian Ferro

customer_reviews.title: Locking mechanism broke
customer_reviews.text: Used it for shaving head and trimming beard. Would use it about once/twice a week for the first 6 months, then maybe twice a month since. Just under a year after I bought it, the locking mechanism which keeps the head at the desired height/length is basically broken (see video). It slips down to the bottom setting at light pressure. Needless to say, when this happens mid-cut, it leads to some unintentionally hilarious looks. Avoid at all costs (unless you like looking like you’ve fought a lawn mower)
customer_reviews.author: Pole Corter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and does a clean job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who's old trimmer had died on him and was pretty rubbish at trimming and tidying up his beard. This does such a neat job and doesn't get caught on hairs or anything. So many length settings which are super handy no matter your beard (or hair) length. Battery charge seems to last quite a while too. It's very easy to keep clean too!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: It's in the BIN where it belongs!
customer_reviews.text: It worked for two occasions, then it started turning itself off randomly, i could only turn it on after a while, not easy to clean, hard to take it apart, not worth the money, brands like this don't care about quality anymoore, they already have a well established name, so can afford c....p products.
customer_reviews.author: cipo

customer_reviews.title: Good for haircuts to 2cm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for haircuts during covid. “BT” stands for beard trimmer but it does hair to 2cm longest. I think this like a #5 #6. If your hair is longer than prob unsuitable (except perhaps for sides). Care needed incase you turn the dial accidentally and cut shorter than planned. Inexpensive and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: BeMo

customer_reviews.title: The battery is useless
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good trimmer but the battery is useless. First time was fine, managed to shave sons hair. Then charged it for 12 hours - dead in less than 2 minutes. Charged again; same issue; and again. Its now been on charge for 3 days and just used it again and it couldn't even finish off trimming my beard before dying. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic battery. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Product bought 8 December 2018. Battery no longer charges sufficient for hair trim or beard trim. This battery has NEVER been allowed to sit without charge. I used to think of Braun as a quality brand. Times have changed. It is just another purveyor of Chinese crap. Steer well clear.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelD

customer_reviews.title: Basic affordable trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: Got it to my hair a trim during lockdown but ended up giving myself the shortest haircut of my life. That's down to me not the cutter! It's saved me from returning to the 1970's with my hair. It's well made, basic but does the job and has one attachment comb. You can adjust the cut with a dial.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life. Doesn't catch your hair.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my fifteen year old Babyliss face-wrecker with this when the battery no longer held charge as far as the bathroom. I haven't used all the attachments etc as I just mow my face on a weekly basis and shave afterwards. I haven't recharged it as yet and it must be a month or so since I bought it. Can't fault it yet.
customer_reviews.author: MisterScare

customer_reviews.title: light and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: the real points for this are that it's battery powered and lightweight, perfect for travel. however the blades aren't the sharpest and the motor sometimes struggles with thick beard hair
customer_reviews.author: Char Aznable

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I was expecting this trimmer to be a bit bigger. It's quite small. It comes pre-charged for about 5 minutes of trimming. You then have to let it charge for the recommended 10 hours. However, the green light on the charger doesn't turn off when it's fully charged - you'll just have to guess. Apart from that it's easy to use and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: V Singh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been able to have a haircut while under lockdown but with this thing I can at least make sure my beard isn't scraggly. Very easy to use . I keep it plugged in all the time so I can't speak about battery life but it works well and it's well made. I have no reservations in recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not a hair clippers. It is just a beard trimmer. Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a hair clippers. It is just a beard trimmer. Buying this from amazon is positively the most expensive way to buy a beard trimmer. Do not buy this. Does not come with the correct plug for my location or an adapter. It has an American plug. My country has more power coming from the walls than the US does. Will this explode if I leave it plugged in? Possibly. BEWARE.
customer_reviews.author: Conor R.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a budget, mediocre performance
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality. However I am not convinced about the performance of the cutting. Definitely need another narrower head to do smaller areas around the mouth. Also the charger light stays on indefinitely. Can't see of it's fully charged to unplug from the socket.
customer_reviews.author: JMan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use hair and beard trimmer
customer_reviews.text: With lockdown restrictions and not wishing to wait for barbers to re-open, I decided to cut my own hair. These trimmers were easy to use on my own head and enabled me to be more comfortable. There is a good range of length settings - up to 20mm (i.e. about no. 6 or 7) and it now makes my beard trimming much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisngtf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and variable length options
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and his "lockdown beard". He is very pleased with it. Easy to use and clean. He particularly likes the dial for selecting different lengths. Only downside is getting an even finish on his moustache as he has found it difficult to trim the hair directly under his nose - practice will make perfect?
customer_reviews.author: CEHW

customer_reviews.title: Best beard trimmer I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I've been able to grow facial hair, I've always preferred the stubby look and over the years I've own various sets of clippers. These are by far the best I've ever had. The cut is precise and consistent and my stubble has never looked so even. I've also used them to cut my hair (as is necessary in these times of Covid!) and they do a great job. My only improvement would be if they also did a 20-40mm comb, then they would be perfect for all beard/hair cutting needs.
customer_reviews.author: Grahame Y.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old Braun beard trimmer as the battery had given up. With the enforced lock down I bit the bullet and used it to cut my hair. Worked perfectly. One key feature is that the blade spacer click/locks in place, this help avoid inadvertent crew cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I can find no fault. The battery life seems fine, I just routinely plug it in every couple of days, It's no hassle. Feels good in the hand with a nice grip. I have no problem with the guard staying place, which some report as an issue. All in all, a good item
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Needs several passes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first battery powered trimmer that I'm not particularly impressed with - it takes a lot more passes than my mains/battery powered BaByliss unit. It's also very light which is good for travelling with but I prefer more heft. In its defence, it ain't that costly.
customer_reviews.author: busb

customer_reviews.title: Cuts hair well, and a free razor.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during the lockdown as I don’t like having untidy hair. Like other people I was a bit sceptical because it is a beard trimmer, and I don’t have a beard, but it works fine, and my wife did a really nice hair cut on her first time using it. It does come with a two pin round plug, but it works in any shaving socket, and charges quickly. I would have no hesitation in recommending this product, and I will save some money by not going to the barber every 5 or 6 weeks. Stay safe.
customer_reviews.author: The truth IS out there!

customer_reviews.title: Not a hair clipper!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as it bills itself as a beard trimmer AND hair clipper. It isnt a hair clipper, it blocks within one sweep and needs multiple sweeps to cut hair! Ive gone for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described :)
customer_reviews.text: Great trimmer for the price. The dial moves the guard up and down, and it's easy to take the guard on and off. Good size to hold. Sucks that it only has a 2 pin charger so had to spend and extra £5 on a converter plug, but it tells you that's what it comes with so it's your choice, it's still great for the overall cost in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Great beard trimmer well adjustable but not a great hair trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Much better for beards than hair though will work for both. So adjustable you can grade everything from 1 to 20mm, I even do my eyebrows now.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R

customer_reviews.title: Very good for home use
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for few months now and did not had any problems. It is durable, easy to charge, water-proof and easily adjustable. Doesn't have the 'industrial/professional' feel to it and it will take a bit longer to cut the hair, but as mentioned in the title, it is for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej Zelewski

customer_reviews.title: Feels really cheap and is too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I know it was only £19.99 but feels very light and cheap. Not like my previous Braun beard shaver that had some weight to it, was wider and generally felt much better quality. In this latest model they seem to have really skimped on design and quality and made something that feels very cheap and plastic. Very disappointed. I think I'll be looking at other brands next time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: best trimmer I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th trimmer I have tried, the other were all just OK, this is great as it has true choice of blade length.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: too expansive for what it actually is
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend this product as it is far too expansive for what it actually is.... if it was £20 it would have been the right price. you think you picked a decent brand but you still get plastic cheap made product with a braun logo on it...I sent it back and got a Chinese made clipper which is at least priced fairly and actually a better product.
customer_reviews.author: myself

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my very old beard trimmer. What a revelation, it makes beard trimming a very easy task. Very well made and with extremely good battery life. I can thoroughly recommend tis beard trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: AlanJohnPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Really weak and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This item is cheap, and it might work for some people, but for me I found it barely cuts hairs. Very much feels like you pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Po

customer_reviews.title: closest shave perfect contour and fade
customer_reviews.text: best clippers I've ever used 100% its the closest shave I've gotten without using a bladed razor great for contouring and doing fades only downfall is it doesnt come with a plug but most of them don't nowadays
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Braun BT3221 Beard Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Two-Pin Round plug only - requires an adapter for UK use. Accurate 10 setting adjustable guard. Will make this a part of my routine.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable shaver
customer_reviews.text: It works prefectly fine and suddenly in the middle of haircut it goes off like battery drains but the second i plug it to adapter it works fine having said that it was fully charged before using it so this makes this shaver very unreliable. AVOID at all costs
customer_reviews.author: Toheed

customer_reviews.title: Decent adjustable trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Decent set of clippers, very close cut with 0 blade. Wouldn’t recommend using 0 blade on your plums! The adjustable heads are good and make for easy grading in of the beard also. Comes with a bonus Razor and 2 blades.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced a philips shaver i’ve had for many years and so pleased with this. I didnt realise how bad my last shaver was until i got this one. It does an excellent beard trim to the desired length and using the bare blade gives a nice close shave
customer_reviews.author: Beats

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Really bad trimmers. They don’t cut properly and they only charge some of the time and the battery life is terrible. I’ve had to buy another brand already.
customer_reviews.author: YDD

customer_reviews.title: Lengths are inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Each length seems to be longer than what it is supposed to be. For example, on the 1mm length it actually seems to be giving more like a 2 or 2.5mm length cut as compared to my previous Phillips beard trimmer. This is quite disappointing as I look to trim my stubble down to 1mm and I simply can't do it with this trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Neat tidy small handheld clippers
customer_reviews.text: Lockdown beard needed attention and this easy to hold device has great range of settings. Easy to clip the guard on the clipper and it copes with soft and coarse facial hair. Small clipper edge for detailed work but not really a head hair device.
customer_reviews.author: Adz85

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin and a bit more.
customer_reviews.text: Got this trimmer in the current pandemic, as I couldn't source a hair clipper. After a couple of weeks use the battery life is good, and it's easy to hold when trimming my beard. Also with the attachments included my other half has managed to give me a haircut. Ok I'm sure it's not up to a true hair clipper, but needs must, and I'm more than happy with the quality and "feel" of the trimmer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KJ Snowdon

customer_reviews.title: Quite robust- reasonable cutting- good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: The cutting is quite good- just make sure you have the correct size of cutter chosen as the attached plastic guard can sometimes slip and you end up with too short or not at all. This was my third Covid hair cutting purchase- by far the best, easy to use, actually fire a reasonable job. Just don’t expect it to be as quick as your barber. They have better kit and better skills Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be aware it's a two pin plug
customer_reviews.text: Two pin plug needs an adaptor for UK three pin plugs
customer_reviews.author: ---Iain---

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I have opened the package, and upon inspecting the blade, it's obvious to see someone else's hair on it. Which is concerning. But the package has also got wear and tear marks to shoe it has been opened already! I think this is absolutely disgusting hence the 1 star! Would put 0 if I could!
customer_reviews.author: ryan brown

customer_reviews.title: Battery is poor and doesn't last very long...
customer_reviews.text: the actual cutters fab, cuts close and i like it but when you use it the battery life really sucks and dies very quickly... A new and longer life battery is a must for this item...
customer_reviews.author: steve webb

customer_reviews.title: More than a beard trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said this is definitely more than a beard trimmer. Works just as well as a hair clipper with very fine adjustments via dial selector. Battery lasts an age and charges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tick Tock

customer_reviews.title: Cuts hair easily
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly short hair and it cut the same as any clippers, it has two combs and you can adjust the length via a dial on the actual clippers themselves. I'd definitely recommend for any lockdown haircuts!
customer_reviews.author: Maester F

product_meta.title: Braun Beard Trimmer BT3022 Beard Trimmer and Hair Clipper Lifetime Sharp Blades, 2 pin plug
product_meta.description:
Create different beard styles with the new Braun BT3022 rechargeable men’s beard trimmer. 20 length settings and lifetime sharp blades deliver ultimate precision for an even cut. Fully washable trimmer head and comb. Box includes: 1 x rechargeable BeardTrimmer BT3022 1 x comb for 20 length settings (0.5 - 10mm) 1 x cleaning brush User manual Guarantee

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Beard Trimmer; 1 X Trimming Comb
feature_bullets: Lifetime sharp blades for even beard trimming and hair clipping
Precision dial for beard trimming in 20 length settings
1 - 10mm trimming comb for short to medium beards
Fully washable beard clipper head and trimming comb attachment
This product comes with a two-pin UK plug.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,685 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
